meanings.sent1: Wherefore did you leave the party early?
meanings.sent2: I cannot understand wherefore she acted that way.
meanings.sent3: Wherefore did the chicken cross the road? To get to the other side!
meanings.sent4: The mystery novel kept readers guessing wherefore the crime was committed.
meanings.sent5: The detective pondered wherefore the suspect had a motive to lie.

meanings.sent1: She forgot her umbrella, wherefore she got soaked in the rain.
meanings.sent2: He missed the train, wherefore he arrived late to the meeting.
meanings.sent3: He ate too much cake, wherefore he felt sick afterwards.
meanings.sent4: The storm caused a power outage, wherefore the whole neighborhood was in darkness.
meanings.sent5: The team won the championship, wherefore they celebrated with a parade.
